name: humaninloop-marketplace
description: Multi-agent workflow plugins for specification-driven development

plugins.name: humaninloop-core
plugins.description: Domain-agnostic capabilities for software engineering: deep thinking, codebase understanding, context management, and validation patterns

plugins.name: humaninloop-specs
plugins.description: Specification and requirements workflow: specify → checklist validation (requires humaninloop-core)

plugins.name: humaninloop
plugins.description: Implementation workflow: plan → tasks → implement (requires humaninloop-core)

plugins.name: humaninloop-constitution
plugins.description: Project constitution setup for HumanInLoop workflows
